fields.name: - Target two players and cause mischief:
fields.value:
each target will be hit with a random effect selected from the following list
- Roleblock
- Redirect randomly
- Forced to vote a random target 12 hours into the next day
- Redirect into themselves
- Feedback randomly altered
- Next ability used becomes a Basic Attack instead. If the ability does not target anyone, nothing changes.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If you are attacked and survive, you will automatically cause mischief for the attacker the next night.
- You are roleblock and redirect immune.
- Targets are not informed of the forced vote or ability conversion.
